General.Name: China Aerospace Times Electronics Co Ltd
General.Description: China Aerospace Times Electronics CO., LTD. researches, develops, manufactures, and sells aerospace electronics, unmanned systems and high-end intelligent equipment, wire and cable and other products in China. It offers strategic and tactical missile, rocket, and precision-guided weapon systems; space transportation, near-space vehicle, ground-effect vehicle, and unmanned equipment systems, as well as related supporting products sales and services; various space vehicles; commercial satellite launch and satellite operation services; and satellite communication, and radio and television transmission services. The company also trades in military products, various commercial satellites, and aerospace products; and automobiles and parts. In addition, it is involved in the state-owned assets investment, operation, and management activities; and research and development, sales, and services of various satellite application systems and related products. Further, the company provides aerospace engineering and technology research, test, technical consultation, and promotion application services; geographic information surveying and mapping technology products and services; electrical machinery, instruments and meters, computers, communications and other electronic information equipment; chemical raw materials, chemical products, and special materials; general and special equipment; investment services; and cultural and artistic exchange services. Additionally, it offers aerospace integrated information systems, inertial navigation, integrated circuits, and electromechanical components; and civil wires, cables, and military specialty cable products. The company was founded in 1986 and is headquartered in Beijing, China.
General.Address: Wuhan Eco & Tech Dev Zn, Wuhan, China, 430056
